title: U.S. - ⭐ EPA Employee Spotlight ⭐   Meet John Williams, an On-Scene Coordinator in the U.S. EPA Pacific Southwest Region!  With degrees in environmental microbiology and geology from Georgia State University, John recently joined EPA where he now works on a variety of projects that help the agency fulfill its mission to provide clean air, land and water and protect the environment throughout the Pacific Southwest region. John’s past roles in managing response and risk assessment helped propel his efforts in supporting the region during the Los Angeles wildfires earlier this year. John likes to spend his free time hiking, swimming, playing guitar and sketching.  Thank you for making a difference at EPA and beyond! | Facebook
